title: FS FT: T206 Old Mill Griffith SGC 20 SOLD
author: Piratedogcardshows

posts.post_title: FS FT: T206 Old Mill Griffith SGC 20 SOLD
posts.post_content: Up for sale is this Old Mill SGC 20 example of Clark Griffith batting. Price includes shipping and im always willing to trade for T210/T209/T206 Revelle and Lipe cards. Thank you very much.
Price is 95.00 now 90.00 delivered. For more detailed scans just send me your email!
Anyone have a Virginia League OM SL T206 they would like to trade?
